```{r}
climate.PLI.null <- glm(PLI.f ~ 1 ,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=zscores.regen)
summary(climate.PLI.null)

climate.PLI.base <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since, 
    family=binomial(link="logit"), data=zscores.regen)
summary(climate.PLI.base)

climate.PLI.a <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + hot.dry.sum ,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=zscores.regen)
summary(climate.PLI.a)
lrtest(climate.PLI.a, climate.PLI.base)

climate.PLI.b <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + cool.wet.sum ,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=zscores.regen)
summary(climate.PLI.b)
lrtest(climate.PLI.b, climate.PLI.base)
```


```{r}
PLI.a <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.a)
lrtest(PLI.a, PLI.null)

PLI.b <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + as.factor(BARC.x),
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.b)

PLI.c <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + PLI_percent,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.c)

PLI.d <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + BEC_Zone,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.d)

PLI.e <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + PARENT_SOILS,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.e)

PLI.f <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since +  Slope + Slope*sin(Aspect*(pi/180)) + Slope*cos(Aspect*(pi/180)),
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.f)

PLI.g <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + hot.dry.sum,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.g)
```
```{r}
PLI.1 <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + PLI_percent + hot.dry.sum,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.1)

PLI.2 <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + PLI_percent + hot.dry.sum + BEC_Zone,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.2)
lrtest(PLI.2, PLI.1)

PLI.3 <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + PLI_percent + hot.dry.sum + PARENT_SOILS,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.3)
lrtest(PLI.3, PLI.1)

PLI.4 <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + PLI_percent + hot.dry.sum + PARENT_SOILS + Slope + Slope*sin(Aspect*(pi/180)) + Slope*cos(Aspect*(pi/180)),
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.4)
lrtest(PLI.4, PLI.1)

PLI.5 <- glm(PLI.f ~ years_since + as.factor(BARC.x) + PLI_percent + hot.dry.sum,
    family=binomial(link = "logit"), data=bin_dis_GIS1)
summary(PLI.5)
lrtest(PLI.1, PLI.5)
```
